name: places/ChIJLSTLvqJYwokRoCVAb25_tLE
formattedAddress: 22 E 88th St, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 22 E 88th St, New York, NY 10128-0509, USA

originalText.text:
Dr. Snady diagnosed me after 8 years of other doctors couldn’t figure out. I was in pain nausea and vomiting for years. Was out on opioid meds as well. When I would go to the emergency room was treated like a drug addict when I was patient with a legit reason why I felt that way. I’ve never thought I would be able to say I’m pain free but I am. I lost hope for years. I’m beyond grateful I’m at a loss of words. No pills and no pain..It’s all I’ve ever wanted, he said he would and he did, give me a better quality of life. He went above and beyond when others gave up. Dr Snady is a special doctor be thankful you found him. He changed my life.

Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!

originalText.text:
I know this doctor from his Weehawken location. He goes above and beyond his job description--more than any doctor I've ever met. Highly recommend.

Also speaks Spanish which is great for my family.

originalText.text: Great doctor, friendly staff!  Would highly recommend!

originalText.text:
So thorough and compassionate! Laurel in his office manages his schedule with amazing dexterity!
His NJ office has an amazing view of midtown!
